channel.title: cat-ḤUQÚQU’LLÁH: KO TĒTAHI MŌTIKA NĀ TE ATU on devotional.gq
channel.description: Recent content in cat-ḤUQÚQU’LLÁH: KO TĒTAHI MŌTIKA NĀ TE ATU on devotional.gq

item.title: Prayer bpn10205 in Māori
item.description: *Ko Huqúqu’lláh tētahi tino ture. Mā tēnā mā tēnā tēnei tukunga nō te mea he mātāpuna o te tohu aroha, o te tōnui, o te pai katoa, He takoha e noho ai ki ia wairua ora ki ia ao a Te Atua, te Pouwhiwhi- Katoa, te Whairawanui- Katoa. Whakanui akehia ai Koe, e Te Ariki o te orokohanganga katoa, kia tahuri ngā mea katoa ki Tō Kotahi. Ki aku arero ā-kikokiko, ā-wairua, ko taku whakaaturanga kua whaitinana Koe, kua whakakitea, kua tukua iho Āu tohu, kua whakatātakina Āu whakaaturanga.
